div.div: Inter-seasonal variation in body mass, BMR, M SUM and ME.
div.p: Data are least square means controlling for year, season and sex (and time of capture for body mass) with bird ID as random parameter.
Click here for additional data file.

div.div: Intra-seasonal variation in body mass, BMR, M SUM and ME.
div.p: Data are least square means controlling for sex, year, month and the interaction year*month for M SUM and ME, with bird ID as random parameter. Body mass analysis also included time of capture as covariate.
Click here for additional data file.
